bibl.title: The Date of Succession in the Strategia.
bibl.note: Appointment to the strategia regularly took place in the same period as the conventus. The prefect nevertheless had power to hire and fire strategi whenever he chose, but there are insufficient exceptions to indicate any other regular context of the succession, apart from the conventus.
